title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 504.1 - Decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 504.1 - Decision

State Regulations
(a) At the
conclusion of a proceeding except one brought under section
145
(3)
of the Transportation Law the presiding
officer will make a recommended decision to the commissioner. The commissioner
may adopt, reject or modify such decision. A copy of the decision as adopted, rejected or modified will be served on all parties. In addition, the
commissioner may defer action on any recommendation made by the presiding
officer and publish such recommendation with leave to all parties to file
exceptions within a time set by the commissioner. Failure to file exceptions
within the time allotted shall constitute a waiver of all objections to the
recommended decision. (b) In any
proceeding brought under section
145
(3)
of the Transportation Law, the decision
will be made by the presiding officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
504.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
